channel.title: ThaCraft | FACTIONS & SURVIVAL | 32GB SSD Host | PvP & 24/7 |
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]WEBSITE: http://ThaCraft.com[/b][/size]
[size=18pt][b]IP: play.thacraft.com[/b][/size]
[center][size=14pt]ThaCraft - Factions & Survival[/size]
Our Minecraft was mainly based on Survival / Factions. We slowly moved the server towards becoming a unique RPG server which has become a success without using an economy system which most servers tend to use. Our economy is using Emerald to buy items from villagers. To get Emeralds you must convert 1 Diamond to 3 Emerald via the Bank at our main city which you can get to using the portal under spawn.
[center][size=14pt]Server Information[/size]
Not White-Listed! (Anyone with Premium Minecraft can join)
[b]Common Plugins We Use:[/b]
Mob Arena Team Fortress 2 Spleef Arena Parkour Hunger Games Casino & Much More!
[center][size=14pt]Rules[/size]
No Cheating / Hacking No Begging / Asking for Items No Begging / Asking for Ranks Griefing Is Allowed Scamming Is Allowed No Flaming No Impersonating Admins or Players No Building / Claiming at Spawn No Advertising[/center]

item.description:
@arsham123 wrote:

[size=18pt]WEBSITE: http://ThaCraft.com[/size]

[size=18pt]IP: play.thacraft.com[/size]

[center][size=14pt]ThaCraft - Factions & Survival[/size]

Our Minecraft was mainly based on Survival / Factions. We slowly moved the server towards becoming a unique RPG server which has become a success without using an economy system which most servers tend to use. Our economy is using Emerald to buy items from villagers. To get Emeralds you must convert 1 Diamond to 3 Emerald via the Bank at our main city which you can get to using the portal under spawn.

[center][size=14pt]Server Information[/size]

Not White-Listed! (Anyone with Premium Minecraft can join)

Common Plugins We Use:

Mob Arena
Team Fortress 2
Spleef Arena
Parkour
Hunger Games
Casino
& Much More!

[center][size=14pt]Rules[/size]

No Cheating / Hacking
No Begging / Asking for Items
No Begging / Asking for Ranks
Griefing Is Allowed
Scamming Is Allowed
No Flaming
No Impersonating Admins or Players
